hr.fer.zemris.java.hw16.trazilica

Class Document

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.java.hw16.trazilica.Document

  • public class Document
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of a text document as a "bag of words". Only the words and their frequency is stored disregarding everything else.
    For creating instances of this class, static method createDocument(String, Collection) is available.
    When all planned Document objects are created, TF-IDF vectors can be created for each Document using the buildVector(Map, Collection) method.
    Finally, when vectors are created, Document objects can be compared with calculateSimilarity(Document) method.
    Author:
    Dan

    • Method Detail

      • createDocument

        public static Document createDocument(java.lang.String text,
                                      java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> stopwords)
        Creates a new Document object from given text.
        Text is split into words and if a word is not in a Collection of stopwords its added to this Document.
        Parameters:
        text - text of the whole document
        stopwords - Collection of stopwords that should be ignored while parsing the given text
        Returns:
        a new Document containing words from given text

      • getWords

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> getWords()
        Gets all words in this Document.
        Returns:
        a Collection of words

      • buildVector

        public void buildVector(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> vocabulary,
                        java.util.Collection<Document> documents)
        Calculates the TF-IDF vector for this Document and stores it internally. Vector contains values for all words in given vocabulary.
        This method should be called once all Document objects are created and they are all in given Collection, because otherwise vectors will not match.
        Parameters:
        vocabulary - Collection of all words in all documents
        documents - Collection of all documents

      • removeIfNotInVocabulary

        public void removeIfNotInVocabulary(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> vocabulary)
        Removes words from this Document if they are not contained in given vocabulary.
        Parameters:
        vocabulary - Collection of all words in all documents

      • calculateSimilarity

        public double calculateSimilarity(Document doc)
        Calculates the similarity value of this and given Document based on TF-IDF vectors.
        Parameters:
        doc - another Document
        Returns:
        similarity value in [0,1] interval; bigger value means more similarity

      • getPath

        public java.nio.file.Path getPath()
        Getter for path.
        Returns:
        path of this Document; can be null

      • setPath

        public void setPath(java.nio.file.Path path)
        Setter for path of this Document.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to set
